summary.title: Threat Modeling Assignment
summary.description: Simple web app with login, open-source auth, message-of-the-day, and comments.

threats.title: Spoofing via vulnerable auth
threats.description: Auth component flaw could allow user impersonation.

threats.title: Tampering: stored XSS in comments
threats.description: Unvalidated comment input could be stored XSS.

threats.title: Repudiation: missing audit logs
threats.description: Users can deny posting/changes without audit trail.

threats.title: Info Disclosure: weak transport on login
threats.description: Credentials exposed if TLS not enforced.

threats.title: EoP: missing authorization on MotD ops
threats.description: Lack of RBAC allows unauthorized actions.
